message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm asking for $14,000.  I believe it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its value.  I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product.
